channel.title: Help with prayer

item.title: Help with prayer
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

poopie -.-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 04:33:16 AM[/size][hr]How about this then m8?

case 409: // pray alter startAnimation(645); setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[playerPrayer]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); refreshSkills(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage ("You Recharge Your Prayer-Points"); break;

Best wishes

Hmmm i’ve nvr rlly made 1,

Just as an idea lets combine both of them and get…

case 409: // pray alter startAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = playerLevel[playerPrayer]; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage ("You Recharge Your Prayer-Points"); break;

No idea if this works, im not the best of coders but,

Goodluck and best wishes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 03:44:33 AM[/size][hr]Please send me a message if this works, containing the code

Im on labtop atm so cant code into server,

But if it works id like to use myself

Tyvm
—The Dark Abbys—

mines just

case 409: sendMessage("You've recharged your prayer"); playerLevel[5] = 99; setSkillLevel(5, 99, playerLevel[5]); break;

item.title: Help with prayer
item.dc:creator: @Season-Scape Season-Scape
item.description:
@Season-Scape wrote:

case 409: // pray alter, adding soon startAnimation(645); playerLevel[playerPrayer] += 20; currentpray += 20; sendMessage ("You Recharge Your Prayer-Points"); break;

thats what my code looks like i just came up with it in 5mins
could any2 post there prayer altar so i can get ideas this one works but only if u log in and out plus it goes ove the 99 prayer points

ty

~season~
